title: Grateful Dead Live at Providence Civic Center on 1984-04-27
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave (24 bit) > TLH > FLAC 2448 tagged. Transfer by Andrew F. 07/2013
source: AUD: 3x Nakamichi CM300 w/CP4 shotguns > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell XLIIS, floor just to left (stage right) of soundboard, taped by Tim Friend & Joe Morrone.
